alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 3:07PM EST until January 26 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to three tenths of an inch in the higher terrain. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In Vermont, Bennington and Windham Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 6 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and some tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ice accretion will be mainly limited to elevations above 1500 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
